scripts.setup: python3 -m venv venv && echo 'Virtual environment created! Run: npm run install-deps'
scripts.start: bash -c 'source venv/bin/activate && python3 index.py && mkdocs serve'
scripts.build: bash -c 'source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && python3 -m mkdocs build'
scripts.build-windows: venv\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && python3 -m mkdocs build
scripts.dev: bash -c 'source venv/bin/activate && python3 index.py && mkdocs serve'
scripts.build-with-counts: bash -c 'source venv/bin/activate && python3 index.py && pip install -r requirements.txt && python3 -m mkdocs build'
scripts.build-with-counts-windows: venv\Scripts\activate && python3 index.py && pip install -r requirements.txt && python3 -m mkdocs build
scripts.full-setup: npm run setup && npm run install-deps && echo 'Setup complete! Run: npm start'
